name: Prismatic Wyrmling
description: A medium-sized dragon known for its vibrant appearance and formidable magical abilities, featuring radiant scales that shimmer in multiple colors.
memorable: The Prismatic Wyrmling is immune to radiant damage and possesses powerful spellcasting abilities, making it a unique opponent.
goals: To assert its dominance in its territory and employ magic for various strategic advantages.
relations: Related to other dragons and could be found in a lair alongside elder dragons.
environment: Typically found in magical forests or caverns where it can protect its territory.
strengths: Immunity to radiant damage and ability to cast spells at will enhance its combat versatility.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less evasive compared to other creatures.
attacks: Vicious bite attack dealing piercing damage and a powerful Light Beam that inflicts radiant damage in a straight line.
most_powerful_ability: Light Beam attack that emits a damaging beam of radiant energy.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet allows it to detect hidden threats nearby, even in complete darkness.
skills: Has a modest skill in Perception, making it able to notice hidden things somewhat effectively.
additional_information: Can cast Dancing Lights at will for illumination.
Once per day can charm humanoids using Charm Person.
Has the ability to blind foes temporarily using Color Spray.
Relies on its spellcasting to control the battlefield.
Radiant transformation of its body makes it visually striking.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will and once per day, including Dancing Lights, Charm Person, and Color Spray.
test_queries: medium dragon that can blind enemies
spellcasting dragon immune to radiant damage
dragon known for vibrant magical attacks
